entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
